span.span: The location of the loaded file that contains the manifest.

value.span: 如果已加载文件使用了影像复制，则该位置是该文件被影像复制后的位置。

span.span: If the loaded file was shadow-copied, the location is that of the file after being shadow-copied.

value.span: 如果从字节数组加载程序集（如使用 方法重载时），则返回值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: If the assembly is loaded from a byte array, such as when using the method overload, the value returned is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 属性获取的路径或通用命名约定 (UNC) 包含清单的已加载文件的位置。The property gets the path or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) location of the loaded file that contains the manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: event System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler ModuleResolve;
.event class System.Reflection.ModuleResolveEventHandler ModuleResolve
Event ModuleResolve As ModuleResolveEventHandler
public: event System::Reflection::ModuleResolveEventHandler ^ ModuleResolve;

summary.span: 为 COM 对象提供对 事件的版本无关的访问。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 事件发生时公共语言运行时类加载程序无法解析对程序集通过正常方法的内部模块的引用。The event occurs when the common language runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an internal module of an assembly through normal means.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToString ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Function ToString () As String
public: System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 为 COM 对象提供对 方法的版本无关的访问。

span.span: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the method.

returns.span: 程序集的全名；如果不能确定程序集的全名，则为类名。

span.span: The full name of the assembly, or the class name if the full name of the assembly cannot be determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 方法返回的程序集，也称为显示名称的完整名称。The method returns the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.
